ws2d.core.server

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ws2d.core.server.Scheduler

  • public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class keeps track of timed tasks for the server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Scheduler()
      Constructs a new instance of Scheduler.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void resumeTask(int uid)
      Resumes the execution of the task with the specified unique ID.
      int runTaskLater(java.lang.Runnable task, long delay)
      Schedules a task to be executed after a certain number of ticks.
      int runTaskNextTick(java.lang.Runnable task)
      Schedules a task to be executed on the next server tick.
      int runTaskRepeatedly(java.lang.Runnable task, long cycle)
      Schedules a task to be repeated every certain number of ticks.
      void stopTask(int uid)
      Terminates the execution of the task with the specified unique ID.
      void suspendTask(int uid)
      Pauses the execution of the task with the specified unique ID.
      void tick()
      Updates all schedules tasks by calling their respective tick methods.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Scheduler

        public Scheduler()
        Constructs a new instance of Scheduler.

    • Method Detail

      • runTaskLater

        public int runTaskLater(java.lang.Runnable task,
                        long delay)
        Schedules a task to be executed after a certain number of ticks.
        Parameters:
        task - the task to execute.
        delay - the number of ticks before it executes.
        Returns:
        the unique ID of the scheduled task.

      • runTaskNextTick

        public int runTaskNextTick(java.lang.Runnable task)
        Schedules a task to be executed on the next server tick.
        Parameters:
        task - the task to execute.
        Returns:
        the unique ID of the scheduled task.

      • runTaskRepeatedly

        public int runTaskRepeatedly(java.lang.Runnable task,
                             long cycle)
        Schedules a task to be repeated every certain number of ticks.
        Parameters:
        task - the task to execute.
        cycle - the amount of ticks between executions.
        Returns:
        the unique ID of the scheduled task.

      • suspendTask

        public void suspendTask(int uid)
        Pauses the execution of the task with the specified unique ID.
        Parameters:
        uid - the unique ID of the task.

      • resumeTask

        public void resumeTask(int uid)
        Resumes the execution of the task with the specified unique ID.
        Parameters:
        uid - the unique ID of the task.

      • stopTask

        public void stopTask(int uid)
        Terminates the execution of the task with the specified unique ID.
        Parameters:
        uid - the unique ID of the task.

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Updates all schedules tasks by calling their respective tick methods. This method should be called once per tick to keep timing consistent.
